solidbase.core
Class PatchFile

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.PatchFile

public class PatchFile
extends Object

This class manages the patch file contents and the paths between versions.

Since:
Apr 1, 2006 7:18:27 PM
Author:
René M. de Bloois

Constructor Detail

PatchFile

protected PatchFile(RandomAccessLineReader file)
Creates an new instance of a patch file.

Parameters:
file - The reader which is used to read the contents of the file.
Method Detail

close

protected void close()
Close the patch file. This will also close the underlying file.

read

protected void read()
Reads and analyzes the patch file. The result is that the patches map is filled with the available patches.

stringToType

protected Patch.Type stringToType(String type)
Translates a patch type string to a type enum.

Parameters:
type - A patch type string.
Returns:
The corresponding type enum.

scan

protected void scan()
Scans for patches in the file. Called by read().

getPatch

protected Patch getPatch(String source,
                         String target)
Returns the patch belonging to the specified source and target. Also checks for duplicates.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
target - The target version.
Returns:
The corresponding patch.

getInitPatch

protected Patch getInitPatch(String source,
                             String target)
Returns the patch belonging to the specified source and target. Also checks for duplicates.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
target - The target version.
Returns:
The corresponding patch.

getPatchPath

protected List getPatchPath(String source,
                            String target,
                            boolean downgradesAllowed)
Returns a patch path for the specified source and target.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
target - The target version.
downgradesAllowed - Allow downgrades in the resulting path.
Returns:
A list of patches that correspond to the given source and target versions.

getInitPath

protected List getInitPath(String source)
Returns an init patch path for the specified source. As initialization is always done to the latest version, no target is needed.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
Returns:
A list of init patches that correspond to the given source.

collectTargets

protected void collectTargets(String version,
                              String targeting,
                              boolean tips,
                              boolean downgradesAllowed,
                              String prefix,
                              Set<String> result)
Determines all possible target versions from the specified source version. The current version is also considered.

Parameters:
version - Current version.
targeting - Indicates that we are already targeting a specific version.
tips - Only return tip versions.
downgradesAllowed - Allow downgrades.
prefix - Only consider versions that start with the given prefix.
result - All results are added to this set.

getReachableVersions

protected LinkedHashSet<String> getReachableVersions(String source,
                                                     String targeting,
                                                     boolean downgradesAllowed)
Gets all versions that are reachable from the given source version.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
targeting - Indicates that we are already targeting a specific version.
downgradesAllowed - Allow downgrades.
Returns:
Returns an ordered set of versions that are reachable from the given source version.

collectReachableVersions

protected void collectReachableVersions(String source,
                                        String targeting,
                                        boolean downgradesAllowed,
                                        Set<String> result)
Retrieves all versions that are reachable from the given source version.

Parameters:
source - The source version.
targeting - Already targeting a specific version.
downgradesAllowed - Allow downgrades.
result - This set gets filled with all versions that are reachable from the given source version.

gotoPatch

protected void gotoPatch(Patch patch)
Jump to the position in the patch file where the given patch starts.

Parameters:
patch - The patch to jump to.

readStatement

protected Command readStatement()
Reads a statement from the patch file.

Returns:
A statement from the patch file or null when no more statements are available.

getEncoding

public String getEncoding()
Gets the encoding of the patch file.

Returns:
The encoding of the patch file.
